column1: '''''Wisterian'' (20 December 1968)''' is an issue of a magazine published by [[Wikipedia:La Salle College High School
column2: La Salle College High School]]. The issue (p. 3) reproduces a letter from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] to Billy Callahan  (see [[Letter to Billy Callahan]]). Also includes a slightly inaccurate transcription of the letter.<ref>{{webcite
